## Errors and Challenges

-   Making filtered column tabs on different main tabs.

-   Having the input filters affect dashboard visuals.

-   Finding a suitable data set.

## Future Advice

-   Gradually build personal dashboard through each practice.

-   Go step by step, don't take on too much at once.

-   Take more time in choosing your data set.
